description: Auto-generate ALT attributes for img tags using Gemini API (supports HTML/PHP/JSX/TSX with static paths)
command.generateAlt: Generate ALT attribute for img tags
command.generateVideoAriaLabel: Generate aria-label attribute for video tags
config.geminiApiKey.markdownDescription:
Gemini API Key ([Get API key from Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/api-keys))  

**Note:** The API key is stored securely and displayed as dots for security.  
[Clear API Key](command:alt-generator.clearApiKey)
config.geminiApiModel.enum.pro: Most advanced model for complex tasks
config.generationMode.enum.seo: SEO: Content optimized for search engines and crawlers
config.generationMode.enum.a11y: A11Y: Content optimized for screen reader users
config.a11yDescriptionLength.markdownDes: **A11Y mode only:** Control the level of detail in generated ALT text descriptions.
config.a11yDescriptionLength.enum.standa: Standard: Balanced descriptions that provide essential information (50-120 chars for Japanese, 60-130 chars for English)
config.a11yDescriptionLength.enum.detail: Detailed: Comprehensive descriptions for complex images (100-200 chars for Japanese, 100-200 chars for English)
config.contextEnabled.markdownDescriptio:
Analyze surrounding text (sibling and parent elements) to avoid redundant ALT descriptions.  

**Note:** This increases token usage (~100-400 tokens per image) but improves content quality for both SEO and accessibility.
config.contextRange.markdownDescription: How far to search before and after the image for sibling and parent elements containing relevant text.
config.contextRange.enum.narrow: Narrow (500 chars): Searches nearby elements - suitable for simple layouts
config.contextRange.enum.standard: Standard (1500 chars): Searches distant elements - recommended for most cases
config.contextRange.enum.wide: Wide (3000 chars): Searches very distant elements - for complex nested structures
config.contextRange.enum.veryWide: Very Wide (5000 chars): Maximum search range - for extremely complex page structures
config.customPromptsPath.markdownDescrip:
Path to custom prompts JSON file (relative to workspace root).  

Custom prompts override default prompts. If the file doesn't exist, default prompts are used.  

**Example:** `.vscode/alt-prompts.json`
